General.Name: Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. develops and sells servo presses in Taiwan, Europe, the United States, Japan, and internationally. The company offers straight side crank, eccentric gear, and link presses; solid frame crank link presses; C frame crank presses; heavy stamping; and progressive stamping link presses. It also provides tandem press lines for producing inner and outer body panels for automobiles; transfer presses that are used in frames and structural components for automotive, medical, appliance, and electronic industries; hot stamping line; blanking line; progressive die; and heavy stamping servo and link presses for use in clutch covers, steel wheel rims, brake pads, brake drums, and large oil filter end caps. In addition, the company offers maintenance and inspection services; overhaul services, including framework adjustment and spray-paint, maintenance and renewing of machines, machine precision adjustment, and upgrade of electronic control systems, as well as maintenance on pressing, drive, and clutch systems; and after sales services. It serves automotive, aerospace, medical equipment, agriculture, home appliances, consumer electronics, and building materials and hardware manufacturing industries. The company was formerly known as Shieh Yih Chuang Ironworks Co. and changed its name to Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. in 1982. Shieh Yih Machinery Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 446, Nanshang Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333014
